parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh** (default): Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: ListType
parameters.description:
The type of the list. Valid values:

*   **1**: user-defined
*   **2**: address book

parameters.name: MemberUid
parameters.description: The UID of the member that is managed by your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: VpcFirewallId
parameters.description: The instance ID of the VPC firewall.

parameters.name: WhiteType
parameters.description:
The type of the whitelist. Valid values:

*   **1**: destination
*   **2**: source
